mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX(report_receipt MONTHREPORT)*/ TO_CHAR(RECEIPT_DAY, 'MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM report_receipt WHERE INDIVIDUAL_ID = #{informerId} AND RECEIPT_DAY >= TO_DATE(#{selectYear1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RECEIPT_DAY <= TO_DATE(#{selectYear2}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(RECEIPT_DAY, 'MM') ORDER BY month

SELECT A.INFORMER_ID ,A.ACT_ID ,A.ORG_ID ,A.ORG_SUB_ID ,A.INFORMER_NAME ,A.AREA_CODE ,B.AREA_NAME ,A.PHONE_CELL ,A.PHONE_HOME ,A.PHONE_OFFICE ,A.INFORMER_TYPE ,C.TYPE_NAME INFORMER_TYPE_NAME ,A.FLAG_ACT ,A.REG_DATE ,A.START_DATE ,A.STOP_DATE ,A.MEMO1 ,A.MEMO ,A.ZIPCODE ,A.ADDRESS_HOME ,A.ADDRESS ,A.ZIPCODE2 ,A.ADDRESS_OFFICE ,A.RESIDENT_NUM ,A.BIRTHDAY ,A.CAR_NUM ,A.COMMENTS ,A.REG_DATE ,A.DEL_DATE ,A.UPD_DATE ,A.PHOTO_FILE ,A.INDIVIDUAL_NAME_CHINA ,A.CAR_TYPE ,A.TRS_NO ,A.LAST_SCHOOL ,A.AREA_CODE ,A.HONOR ,A.AGREE ,A.FLAG_BLACKLIST ,A.MEMO2 ,A.IDENTIFI_DATE ,A.FLAG_SERVICE ,A.START_DATE ,A.STOP_DATE ,A.BIRTHDAY_DIV ,A.INFORMER_JOB ,A.FLAG_BROAD ,A.FLAG_ACT FROM INFORMER A LEFT JOIN CODE_AREACODE B ON A.AREA_CODE=B.AREA_CODE LEFT JOIN CODE_INFORMER_TYPE C ON a.informer_type=C.TYPE_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.INFORMER_ID=#{informerId}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO INFORMER_HISTORY ( INFORMER_HIST_ID, INFORMER_ID, REGION_ID, UPDATE_CODE, UPDATE_TEXT, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM DUAL) || LPAD(SEQ_INFORMER_HISTORY.NEXTVAL,6,'0'), #{informerId}, #{areaCode}, #{updateCode}, #{updateText}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
